Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.name: socket(sock:didRead:tag:)
Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: delegate method called after reading data from socket

Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.name: socket(sock:didPartialRead:tag:)
Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: delegate method called after reading partial data for specified data length from socket

Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.name: socket(sock:didWrite:)
Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: delegate method called after reading data from socket

Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.name: socket(sock:didPartialWrite:tag:)
Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: delegate method called after writing partial data for specified data length to socket

Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.name: socket(sock:didConnectToHost:port:)
Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: delegate method called after the connection to destination is established

Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.name: socket(sock:didAcceptNewSocket:)
Protocols/SwiftDSSocketDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: delegate method called after an incoming connection is accepted

Classes/SwiftDSSocket/SocketError.html#/.name: socketErrorCode
Classes/SwiftDSSocket/SocketError.html#/.abstract: specifies error code (only for BSD socket standard error code)

Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:vC13SwiftD.name: userData
Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:vC13SwiftD.abstract: store user data that can be used for context

Classes/SwiftDSSocket/SocketError.html.name: SocketError
Classes/SwiftDSSocket/SocketError.html.abstract: this defines all kinds of error in SwiftDSSocket

Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.abstract: create a new SwiftDSSocket instance by specifying delegate, delegate queue and socket type

Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.name: accept(onPort:)
Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.abstract: listen on a specified port for both IPv4/IPv6

Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.name: readData(tag:)
Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.abstract: read data from socket without given data length

Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.name: readData(toLength:tag:)
Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.abstract: read specified length of data from socket

Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.name: disconnectAfterReading()
Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.abstract: disconnect socket after all read opreations queued up and prevents new read operations

Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.name: disconnectAfterWriting()
Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.abstract: disconnect socket after all write opreations queued up and prevents new write operations

Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.name: disconnectAfterReadingAndWriting()
Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.abstract: disconnect socket after all opreations queued up and prevents new operations

Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.name: disconnect()
Classes/SwiftDSSocket.html#/s:FC13SwiftD.abstract: simply disconnect socket and discards all opreations queued up
